definition: effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: Is head of femur of remedial asepsis sex necrotic what specific is there?
sentences.chinese: 治疗无菌性股骨头坏死有什么特效药？

sentences.english: There are at present no effective treatments for the common cold.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止治疗普通感冒并无特效药。

sentences.english: The so-called specific was a fraud.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的特效药原来是骗人的东西。

sentences.english: Does remedial strain of lumbar muscles have specific?
sentences.chinese: 治疗腰肌劳损有没有特效药？

sentences.english: Stress management can help symptoms, but there is no effective medicine to treat it.
sentences.chinese: 抗压力治疗能缓解症状，但是至今没有特效药。

sentences.english: No specific drug is available that will kill the virus in infected dogs.
sentences.chinese: 没有能杀犬瘟病毒的特效药。

sentences.english: Specific question regarding the triplets in the piece.
sentences.chinese: 关于三个一组在块中的特效药问题。

sentences.english: There is still no cure for a cold.
sentences.chinese: 尚没有治疗鳦感冒的特效药。

sentences.english: There is so far, as the doctor put it , no specific medicine for this illness.
sentences.chinese: 正如医生所说，这种病目前还没有特效药。

sentences.english: COMPOUND】He compounded various substances into an effective medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他把不同的物质调配成特效药。
治疗腮腺炎有特效药吗？

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
to bring under permanent control/to effect a radical cure
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
effective cure, miracle medicine (idiom); fig. wonder-cure for all problems/panacea/elixir
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
